tooltip: Select Queen Moruge as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: The Queen Moruge focuses on improving Gohma durability.
Allows you to summon Queen Moruge, a large defensive hero with very durable armor.
Durable Creature unit with very high armor values.
All Gohma units gain an additional 10% HP.
Increases the non-magic armor of all Gohma units.
